name: Eurobi Racing
description: Eurobi Racing is a simple and addictive time killing game. Upgrade your vehicle and power-ups to maximize high-scores, purchase new cars, and compete against others! Be prepared to run into law enforcement, wonky crash physics, and buggy sound effects.
minimum_requirements: OS: Honestly Probably anything Processor: If it can run Google Chrome you're good Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: Not required Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i9 9900k or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: RTX 2080 Ti Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
